jcomb.core

Interface JCombContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InstanceDependent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PartialJCombContext, StandardJCombContext

    public interface JCombContext
extends InstanceDependent
    Holds information for the current combinatorial test of a test method.
    Author:
    Noah Zuch

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<InputParameter> getAlsoIncludes() 
      java.util.Collection<Constraint> getConstraints() 
      InputParameter getParameter(int index)
      Retrieves the InputParameter object for the given parameter index.
      int getParameterCount()
      Retrieves the number of parameters relevant for the current test.

      • Methods inherited from interface jcomb.core.InstanceDependent

        initializeForInstance

    • Method Detail

      • getAlsoIncludes

        java.util.Collection<InputParameter> getAlsoIncludes()

      • getConstraints

        java.util.Collection<Constraint> getConstraints()

      • getParameter

        InputParameter getParameter(int index)
        Retrieves the InputParameter object for the given parameter index. This index IS NOT the defined index in the CombinationTest annotation, but the index of the input parameter of the test method. See CombinationTest#parameters() for more info.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the input parameter.
        Returns:
        The corresponding parameter object.

      • getParameterCount

        int getParameterCount()
        Retrieves the number of parameters relevant for the current test.
        Returns:
        The number of parameters relevant for the current test.
